          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constant mass in a chemical change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstante Masse in einer chemischen Umwandlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La masse constante dans un changement chimique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Massa constante em uma mudança química</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Massa costante in un cambiamento chimico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταθερή μάζα σε μια χημική αλλαγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Masa constante en un cambio químico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that there is no change in mass under chemical reaction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass conservation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß es keine Änderung in 
der Masse unter chemischer Reaktion gibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'il n'y a aucun changement 
de la masse sous la réaction chimique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que não há nenhuma mudança 
na massa sob a reação química.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che non ci è cambiamento 
nella massa sotto reazione chimica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι δεν υπάρχει καμία 
αλλαγή στη μάζα κάτω από τη χημική αντίδραση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que no hay cambio en masa 
bajo reacción química.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Umwandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
